name: Shadow
pages: Shadows are the incorporeal remnants of long dead warriors. They barely exist in this world, rendering most weapons useless against them. Only gold and weapons from their own realm can do any real damage against these creatures. As they are shadows of the living, they fear sunlight and will burn. Caution should be taken as they can wield magic.

pages.title: Immunities & Weakness
pages.text: Shadows have an immunity to most weapons, reducing their damage to Stone tier. However, all Shadowspawn have a weakness to $(l)Gold$() and $(l)Shadow$() weapons. Gold will do Iron tier damage, a $(l)Shadow Falchion$() will do Diamond tier damage, and a $(l)Shadow Blade$() with do Netherite damage.

pages.title: Shadow Falchion
pages.text: Shadows carry Shadow Falchions and have a good chance of dropping one on death.$(br2)*Shadow Falchions cannot be crafted.*
